job.title: Supervising Registered Nurse II (CVSP)
job.description:
Supervising Registered Nurse II$124,332 - $155,640 annual salary   Do you want a stable job that comes with all of the benefits of State employment? California Correctional Health Care Services (CCHCS) is seeking experienced and skilled CA-licensed Nurse Managers who are ready to be part of a multidisciplinary team dedicated to providing quality primary medical care.&nbsp;   In this key role you will:  - Plan and evaluate the objectives and effectiveness of statewide programs/initiatives, including the Whole Person Care Program, Substance Use Disorder Treatment, and Hepatitis C and HIV Treatment   
  - Plan, assign, supervise, and evaluate the work of program nursing staff, social services, and administrative support staff   
  - Complete audits, ensuring proper documentation of patient care activities and participate in ongoing quality management/improvement efforts   
   To thrive in this role, you must possess three years of registered nursing experience within the last five years, one year of which must have been in a supervisory capacity, and two years of which must have been in a general acute care hospital. (Possession of a Bachelor of Science Degree in Nursing or a Master's Degree in Nursing may be substituted for one year of general acute care hospital experience.)   In return for your efforts, CCHCS offers a comprehensive benefits package, including:  - Bonus for those new to State Service   
  - Generous paid time off and holiday schedule   
  - State of California retirement that vests in 5 years (visit www.CalPERS.ca.gov for retirement formulas)   
  - Robust 401(k) and 457 savings plans (tax defer up to $39,000 - $52,000 per year)   
  - A variety of medical, dental, and vision insurance options   
  - And much more   
   We currently have opportunities at Chuckawalla Valley State Prison (CVSP), located in Blythe.   Take the first step toward joining this team and apply online!   EOE.
